businessrule.SVMXC_Description_c: Start Date/Time cannot be after End Date/Time
businessrule.SVMXC_Parent_Error_Msg_c: Start Date/Time must be before End Date/Time.

businessrule.SVMXC_Description_c: Start Date/Time cannot be after End Date/Time

businessrule.SVMXC_Description_c: If adjustment type is fixed, then adjusted unit and adjusted values are required
businessrule.SVMXC_Parent_Error_Msg_c: If type is fixed, adjusted units and adjust values are required

businessrule.SVMXC_Description_c: Activity, Activity Work Order, and Min Activity Changed are required when Schedule Adjustment is used

businessrule.SVMXC_Description_c: If Max Activity Changed is not Null, then it has to be greater than Min Activity Changed.
